title: Sypher PK's Fortnite Skin Gets Cooler As You Notch More Elims
description: Streamer and content creator Ali "SypherPK" Hassan will be the latest Fortnite-related personality to put his own digital skin in the game when his Icon Series outfit and accessories hit the Fortnite Item Shop next week. SypherPK getting his own set of cosmetics puts him in rarified air, joining the likes of Kathleen "Loserfruit" Belsten, Tyler "Ninja" Blevins, and most recently Maria "Chica" Lopez in

title: Resident Evil Village Shadows of Rose DLC Borrows From RE2 Remake
description: Tamoor and Jean-Luc got hands on with the upcoming Shadows of Rose DLC for Resident Evil Village, which remixes familiar locations and brings in the 3rd person perspective of RE2 Remake.

title: Firearms Expert Reacts To Rainbow Six Siege’s Guns PART 3
description: Jonathan Ferguson, a weapons expert and Keeper of Firearms & Artillery at the Royal Armouries, breaks down more of the weaponry of Rainbow Six: Siege, including the AK-74M, the P90 and .44 Mag Semi-Auto.
